title: Molecular dynamics simulation of the initial stage induction of alkali-activated aluminosilicate minerals
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,13972-13983
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00822G, Paper

Feng Guo, Jizhou Chen, Qingyin Tang, Mengqi Sun, Haibao Feng, Hailiang Gao, Mengmeng Li, Shuang Lu
Molecular dynamics simulations were used to study the micro-reaction behavior of geopolymers and to explore the induction process and structural evolution of the initial stages.
